adrFormatAddress: 220 Riverside Blvd, New York, NY 10069, USA

originalText.text: If your child needs orthodontic attention, I HIGHLY recommend Dr. Mathew. Dr. Mathew and his staff are absolutely incredible. They are welcoming and caring people. My daughter needed extensive care for her teeth. I wanted someone who could not only help improve her smile but also make certain she would receive the best care. Dr. Mathew was there every step of the way explaining the process and what to expect. He made sure we were comfortable with what was necessary and made sure if we had any questions he and his staff were available anytime. My daughter is extremely happy with her experience with Dr. Mathew, as am I. Her smile is much brighter and confident. Thank you Dr. Mathew and staff. We are grateful for your help.

originalText.text: Dr. Sajju Matthews is great! He is very kind and understanding and will make sure you have great teeth and know how to take care of your teeth. The staff are great and help you out when you need. My teeth are straight now!

text.text: Dr. Sajju Matthews is great! He is very kind and understanding and will make sure you have great teeth and know how to take care of your teeth. The staff are great and help you out when you need. My teeth are straight now!

originalText.text: My second boy just completed his orthodontic treatment and we couldn’t be happier. Both my boys are models and actors. Their now perfect teeth are an asset they will have the rest of their lives! Thank you !

text.text: My second boy just completed his orthodontic treatment and we couldn’t be happier. Both my boys are models and actors. Their now perfect teeth are an asset they will have the rest of their lives! Thank you !

originalText.text:
I highly recommend Dr. Saju Matthew of Hudson River Orthodontics.
My daughter had a really challenging set of teeth when the permanent teeth started coming out, as well as a jaw that was too narrow to accommodate a whole set of teeth.  She was referred to Dr. Matthew by her dentist, Dr. Jed Best and Dr. Jerry Ashrafi when she was 7 years as they both felt we should not delay.  The crowding was so intense (three permanent teeth in her gums, positioned one on top of the other) that Dr. Mathew was not sure and told me privately that at a later stage he may have to remove permanent teeth to straighten her teeth out…he said that he hoped with his treatment the jaw would expand, but there were no guarantees.  He was glad that I had come early.  The way he described it to me…just like the center of the head in a new born baby’s skull is not fully sealed until they are around two, similarly, the cartilage of the jaw and palate are soft and can be stretched a bit until around 10-11 years.  Long story short…the process of expanding her jaw and palate and then straightening her teeth took many years and was an involved process with Dr. Matthew doing an amazing job as well as preparing my daughter for the different stages so she could take the steps he needed her to on a daily basis.  She also did not need to loose any of her permanent teeth during the process.

I cannot describe how challenging a feat Dr. Matthew achieved with her.  Today, seven years down the line at age 14, she has a beautiful set of teeth and is in the last stages of her treatment where she uses a retainer every night to ensure that her teeth stay in place.  I highly in recommend Dr. Matthew as he is a gifted orthodontist and has a great bedside manner with the kids.  He is reasonable and timely with his appointments.  After I started my daughter’s treatment with him, I found other kids from my daughter’s school also went to him and were extremely satisfied.

originalText.text: If you need orthodontic work, you can't go wrong with Hudson River Orthodontics. Dr. Mathew and his entire staff are warm, friendly and comforting. My daughter had an expander and braces (retainer now) and her smile is perfect (woohoo!). They explained everything every step of the way AND even though we moved to Connecticut, they were accommodating with Saturday orthodontic care. Highly recommend!
